(R) (W) 20?..This return is circulated in continuation of the Analysis ofShipping Employment 31st October, 1940 s previously circulated.It now includes an analysis of employment of Allied and neutral vessels on Time Charter to U.K. Details of employment are omitted.R.H.C.MINISTRY OF SHIPPING,1st january 1941.
